attributes.action: Ban the playing of RnB and Garage music on mobile phones without headphones on buses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: First thing in the morning on the way to work, the last thing I want to hear is poor music being played out loud. The same applies for in the evening after a hard days work. Why do these people assume that we want to hear their noise??

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
